metadata.description: Calculator problems that involve time-based comparisons

questions.question: What is the product of 3 and 7, and is it greater than the current hour?
questions.answer: Answer must have the answer of product of 3 and 7 and whether it is greater than the current hour

questions.question: Multiply 5 by 9 and compare it to the current time's minute value.
questions.answer: Answer must have the answer of product of 5 and 9 and whether it is greater than the current time's minute value

questions.question: Is the sum of 12 and 8 greater than the current day of the week in number form?
questions.answer: Answer must have the answer of sum of 12 and 8 and whether it is greater than the current day of the week in number form

questions.question: Calculate the product of 6 and 4 and determine if it exceeds the current hour of the day.
questions.answer: Answer must have the answer of product of 6 and 4 and whether it exceeds the current hour of the day

questions.question: What is the difference between 50 and 35, and is it smaller than the current minute of the hour?
questions.answer: Answer must have the answer of difference between 50 and 35 and whether it is smaller than the current minute of the hour

questions.question: Find the result of multiplying 14 by 3 and compare it with the current second.
questions.answer: Answer must have the answer of product of 14 and 3 and a comparison to the current second

questions.question: Calculate 9 times 11 and check if the result is greater than the current year's last digit.
questions.answer: Answer must have the answer of product of 9 and 11 and whether it is greater than the current year's last digit

questions.question: How much is 16 multiplied by 3, and is it greater than the number of hours since midnight?
questions.answer: Answer must have the answer of product of 16 and 3 and whether it is greater than the number of hours since midnight

questions.question: What is the result of 20 multiplied by 5, and is it larger than the current minute of the day?
questions.answer: Answer must have the answer of product of 20 and 5 and whether it is larger than the current minute of the day

questions.question: Multiply 15 by 2 and check if it exceeds the hour value of the current time.
questions.answer: Answer must have the answer of product of 15 and 2 and whether the result is greater than the current hour value
